level.heading: Police reports.
level.text: The Metropolitan Police Department shall make a report of each complaint of identity theft and provide the complainant with a copy of the report.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 2(c) of Identity Thief Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-388, March 18, 2004, 51 DCR 3382).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-106
level.text: For Law 15-106, see notes following ยง 22-3227.01.
